paragraph.value: We find that word vectors and LMs pretrained on small similar sources can achieve competitive or even better performance than the ones pretrained on larger sources (Table 5).  On JNLPBA, ScienceIE and Wetlab, LMs pretrained on the small similar source perform better, while word vectors pretrained on the small similar source perform better on CRAFT, JNLPBA, and ScienceIE.
